Alvin Childress https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alvin_Childress 0 Alvin Childress (September 15, 1907 – April 19, 1986) was an American actor, who is best known for playing the cabdriver Amos Jones in the 1950s television comedy series Amos 'n Andy. Alvin_Childress ( September_15_,_1907 – April_19_,_1986 ) was an_American_actor , who is_best_known for playing the_cabdriver_Amos_Jones in the_1950s_television_comedy_series_Amos_'n_Andy .
